fields.name: Electricity Consumption
fields.description: Enter the total electricity consumed (in kWh) each month from your utility provider.
fields.wizard_question: Enter your monthly electricity consumption in kWh
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the total electricity consumed (in kWh) each month from your utility provider.

fields.name: Water Consumption
fields.description: Enter the total water consumed (in cubic meters) each month.
fields.wizard_question: Enter your monthly water consumption in cubic meters
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the total water consumed (in cubic meters) each month.

fields.name: District Cooling Consumption
fields.description: Enter the total district cooling energy consumed (in RT-h) each month from your utility provider.
fields.condition_logic: Entity is connected to a district cooling network for its cooling needs.
fields.wizard_question: Does your company use a district cooling service for air conditioning?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the total district cooling energy consumed (in RT-h) each month from your utility provider.

fields.name: LPG Fuel Consumption
fields.description: Enter the total LPG (propane) consumed (in kg) in the period.
fields.condition_logic: Entity uses LPG (bottled or bulk) for operations (e.g. kitchens or equipment)
fields.wizard_question: Do you use LPG (cooking gas or similar fuel) in your operations?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the total LPG (propane) consumed (in kg) in the period.

fields.name: Non-hazardous Waste Generated
fields.description: Enter the total quantity of general (non-hazardous) waste generated (kg) for the period.
fields.wizard_question: Enter your monthly landfill waste quantity
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the total quantity of general (non-hazardous) waste generated (kg) for the period.

fields.name: Waste Recycled
fields.description: Enter the quantity of waste recycled (kg) in the period (if any).
fields.condition_logic: Entity separates and recycles part of its waste stream
fields.wizard_question: Do you segregate and recycle any of your waste (paper, plastic, etc.)?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the quantity of waste recycled (kg) in the period (if any).

fields.name: Vehicle Fuel Consumption â€“ Petrol
fields.description: Enter the total petrol (gasoline) fuel consumed by company vehicles (liters per month).
fields.condition_logic: Entity owns/operates gasoline-powered vehicles for business use
fields.wizard_question: Do you have petrol-fueled vehicles (company cars/fleet)?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the total petrol (gasoline) fuel consumed by company vehicles (liters per month).

fields.name: Vehicle Fuel Consumption â€“ Diesel
fields.description: Enter the total diesel fuel consumed by company vehicles (liters per month).
fields.condition_logic: Entity owns/operates diesel-fueled vehicles
fields.wizard_question: Do your company vehicles use diesel fuel (e.g., trucks or generators on wheels)?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the total diesel fuel consumed by company vehicles (liters per month).

fields.name: Diesel Generator Fuel Consumption
fields.description: Enter the total diesel fuel consumed by generators (liters per month).
fields.condition_logic: Entity operates diesel-powered backup generators on-site
fields.wizard_question: Does your company use diesel backup generators for power?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the total diesel fuel consumed by generators (liters per month).

fields.name: Refrigerant Leakage
fields.description: Enter the total amount of refrigerant (kg) added or leaked in the reporting period (by type, if possible).
fields.condition_logic: Entity operates HVAC or refrigeration units and performs refrigerant maintenance
fields.wizard_question: Do you have air conditioning or refrigeration units that require refrigerant (gas) top-ups or servicing?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the total amount of refrigerant (kg) added or leaked in the reporting period (by type, if possible).

fields.name: Total GHG Emissions
fields.description: Enter the total carbon footprint (tCO2e) calculated for your establishment.
fields.wizard_question: Do you calculate your establishment's carbon footprint annually?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the total carbon footprint (tCO2e) calculated for your establishment.

fields.name: Scope 1 Emissions
fields.description: Enter your organization's direct (Scope 1) greenhouse gas emissions
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter your organization's direct (Scope 1) greenhouse gas emissions

fields.name: Scope 2 Emissions
fields.description: Enter your organization's indirect (Scope 2) greenhouse gas emissions from purchased energy
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter your organization's indirect (Scope 2) greenhouse gas emissions from purchased energy

fields.name: Scope 3 Emissions
fields.description: Enter your organization's value chain (Scope 3) greenhouse gas emissions, if applicable
fields.condition_logic: Entity has significant value chain emissions or chooses to report Scope 3
fields.wizard_question: Does your organization have significant value chain emissions that should be reported?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter your organization's value chain (Scope 3) greenhouse gas emissions, if applicable

fields.name: Baseline Year Emissions
fields.description: Unique
fields.wizard_question: Enter your organization's baseline year emissions and specify the baseline year
fields.detailed_prompt: Unique

fields.name: Emissions Reduction Target
fields.description: Unique
fields.wizard_question: Enter your organization's emissions reduction target (percentage reduction from baseline)
fields.detailed_prompt: Unique

fields.name: Emissions Reduction Measures
fields.description: Unique
fields.wizard_question: Describe your organization's current and planned measures to reduce greenhouse gas emissions
fields.detailed_prompt: Unique

fields.name: Carbon Offsets Purchased
fields.description: Enter the quantity of carbon offsets purchased during the reporting period
fields.condition_logic: Entity engages in carbon offsetting activities
fields.wizard_question: Does your organization purchase carbon offsets to compensate for emissions?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the quantity of carbon offsets purchased during the reporting period

fields.name: Hazardous Waste Generated
fields.description: Enter the total quantity of hazardous waste generated (kg) for the reporting period.
fields.condition_logic: Entity's operations produce hazardous or regulated waste
fields.wizard_question: Does your company generate any hazardous waste (e.g. chemicals, batteries, medical waste)?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the total quantity of hazardous waste generated (kg) for the reporting period.

fields.name: On-site Renewable Energy Generation
fields.description: Enter the electricity generated by your renewable energy system (kWh per month).
fields.condition_logic: Entity has on-site renewable energy installations (solar PV, wind, etc.)
fields.wizard_question: Do you generate any electricity on-site from renewable sources (solar panels, etc.)?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the electricity generated by your renewable energy system (kWh per month).

fields.name: Diesel - Owned Vehicles and Generators
fields.description: Enter the total diesel fuel consumed (liters per month).
fields.condition_logic: Hotel owns/operates diesel vehicles or generators
fields.wizard_question: Do you have diesel-fueled vehicles or generators?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the total diesel fuel consumed (liters per month).

fields.name: Performance Metrics (Carbon Calculator)
fields.description: Do you submit monthly carbon emission data through the Dubai Carbon Calculator? (Yes/No)
fields.wizard_question: Do you use the Dubai Carbon Calculator?
fields.detailed_prompt: Do you submit monthly carbon emission data through the Dubai Carbon Calculator? (Yes/No)

fields.name: Energy Management Plan
fields.description: Do you have a formal energy management plan in place? (Yes/No)

fields.detailed_prompt: Do you have a formal energy management plan in place? (Yes/No)

fields.detailed_prompt: Do you have automated systems for energy management? (Yes/No)

fields.detailed_prompt: Do you have a formal water conservation measures in place? (Yes/No)

fields.wizard_question: Do you have a waste management plan?
fields.detailed_prompt: Do you have a formal waste management plan in place? (Yes/No)

fields.detailed_prompt: Do you have sustainable waste management practices in bathrooms? (Yes/No)

fields.name: Minimise Pollution

fields.detailed_prompt: Do you have practices to minimize pollution? (Yes/No)

fields.detailed_prompt: Do you have sustainable purchasing practices? (Yes/No)

fields.name: Water Flow Rate - Showers
fields.description: Enter the flow rate (L/min) of your showerheads.
fields.wizard_question: Do your showers have a maximum flow rate of 9 litres per minute?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the flow rate (L/min) of your showerheads.

fields.name: Water Flow Rate - Taps
fields.description: Enter the flow rate (L/min) of your taps.
fields.wizard_question: Do your taps have a maximum flow rate of 8 litres per minute?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the flow rate (L/min) of your taps.

fields.name: Dual Flush Toilets
fields.description: Confirm that newly purchased toilets have a 3/6 litres dual flush system.
fields.wizard_question: Are your newly purchased toilets dual flush (3/6 litres)?
fields.detailed_prompt: Confirm that newly purchased toilets have a 3/6 litres dual flush system.

fields.name: Sub-metered Water Consumption
fields.description: Enter the monthly water consumption (mÂ³) from sub-metered areas.
fields.condition_logic: Entity has areas with high water consumption (kitchens, pools, laundry)
fields.wizard_question: Do you have separate water meters for high consumption areas?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the monthly water consumption (mÂ³) from sub-metered areas.

fields.name: Energy-efficient Lighting
fields.description: Enter the percentage of energy-efficient light bulbs in your establishment.
fields.wizard_question: What percentage of your light bulbs are energy-efficient?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the percentage of energy-efficient light bulbs in your establishment.

fields.name: LED Lighting Percentage
fields.description: Enter the percentage of LED light bulbs in your establishment.
fields.wizard_question: What percentage of your light bulbs are LED?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the percentage of LED light bulbs in your establishment.

fields.name: Renewable Energy Percentage
fields.description: Enter the percentage of renewable energy in your total energy consumption.
fields.condition_logic: Entity purchases or generates renewable energy
fields.wizard_question: Do you use or purchase renewable energy?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the percentage of renewable energy in your total energy consumption.

fields.name: Recycling Rate
fields.description: Enter the percentage of waste that is recycled.
fields.condition_logic: Entity separates and recycles part of its waste stream
fields.wizard_question: Do you track your recycling rate?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the percentage of waste that is recycled.

fields.name: Organic Waste Composting
fields.description: Enter the quantity of organic waste composted (kg) in the period.
fields.condition_logic: Entity generates organic waste and has composting facilities
fields.wizard_question: Do you compost your organic waste?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the quantity of organic waste composted (kg) in the period.

fields.name: Sustainable Food Products
fields.description: Enter the number of types of sustainable food/beverage products you purchase.
fields.wizard_question: Do you purchase sustainable food products?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the number of types of sustainable food/beverage products you purchase.

fields.name: Vegetarian/Vegan Options
fields.description: Confirm the availability of vegetarian and vegan menu options.
fields.wizard_question: Do you offer vegetarian and vegan menu options?
fields.detailed_prompt: Confirm the availability of vegetarian and vegan menu options.

fields.detailed_prompt: Does your company have a formal Supplier Code of Conduct that is communicated to your suppliers? (Yes/No)

fields.name: Environmental Manager Appointment
fields.description: Confirm the appointment of an environmental manager responsible for sustainability initiatives.
fields.wizard_question: Have you appointed an environmental manager from your staff?
fields.detailed_prompt: Confirm the appointment of an environmental manager responsible for sustainability initiatives.

fields.name: Annual Action Plan
fields.description: Enter the number of action points in your annual sustainability action plan.
fields.wizard_question: Do you have an annual action plan with sustainability objectives?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the number of action points in your annual sustainability action plan.

fields.name: Carbon Reduction Target
fields.description: Enter the percentage reduction target for your carbon footprint.
fields.condition_logic: Entity has calculated its carbon footprint and is committed to reduction
fields.wizard_question: Have you set a target to reduce your carbon footprint?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the percentage reduction target for your carbon footprint.

fields.name: Water Leak Detection System
fields.description: Enter the number of leak checks performed daily.
fields.wizard_question: Do you have a system to regularly check for water leaks?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the number of leak checks performed daily.

fields.name: Automatic Energy Control Systems

fields.detailed_prompt: Confirm the presence of automatic energy control systems in guest and meeting rooms.

fields.name: Waste Separation Categories
fields.description: Enter the number of waste categories you separate for recycling.
fields.wizard_question: Do you separate waste into different categories?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the number of waste categories you separate for recycling.

fields.name: Eco-labeled Cleaning Products
fields.description: Enter the percentage of eco-labeled cleaning products you use.
fields.wizard_question: Do you use eco-labeled cleaning products?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the percentage of eco-labeled cleaning products you use.

fields.description: Confirm the use of non-chlorine bleached or eco-labeled paper products.

fields.detailed_prompt: Confirm the use of non-chlorine bleached or eco-labeled paper products.

fields.name: Eco-labeled Equipment
fields.description: Confirm that newly purchased equipment is eco-labeled.

fields.wizard_question: Do you purchase eco-labeled equipment?
fields.detailed_prompt: Confirm that newly purchased equipment is eco-labeled.

fields.name: Guest Sustainability Education
fields.description: Confirm the availability of environmental information to guests.

fields.detailed_prompt: Confirm the availability of environmental information to guests.

fields.name: Total Workforce Size

fields.wizard_question: Enter the percentage of your employees who are female (% of total workforce).

fields.name: Total Recordable Injuries

fields.name: Grievances Reported

fields.wizard_question: Enter how many of the reported grievances were resolved during the year.

fields.name: Workforce Nationalities

fields.name: Community Investment
fields.description: Enter the total value (in AED) of your community investment, including cash, in-kind donations, and volunteering hours, for the year.

fields.wizard_question: Does your company make financial or in-kind donations to the community or charitable causes?
fields.detailed_prompt: Enter the total value (in AED) of your community investment, including cash, in-kind donations, and volunteering hours, for the year.
